participant_1.background:
I think of silly nicknames for my older brother, and then I start to wonder if people are thinking nice things about him when they hear them.
I like to dress up to impress, but comfort is the key to my happiness.
I'm looking for a new place to live that is close to my favorite fishing spot.
I'm learning to swim and I'm doing my best.
i want people to think i m cool.

participant_2.background:
I was a personal chef before I started my own meatloaf catering business.
i like to stay fit.
I have a dog and a cat, both of whom are very well-behaved.
I like my job, but I don't have a lot of family support.
I am short for my age, but I am strong and fit.

content.text: What's your favorite thing about your job?
I like the flexibility it offers me. I can work my own hours and be my own boss.
That's awesome! I wish I had a job like that.
You could start your own business.
I've thought about it, but I'm not sure what I'd do.
I like to cook, so maybe I could start a food business.
That's a great idea! You could start by catering events.
That's a great idea! I'll have to look into it.
You should! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
